testimonials.title: Loved by professionals across Brazil
testimonials.subtitle: See what our clients are saying about the transformation in their businesses

testimonials.name: Mariana Silva
testimonials.content: I increased my appointments by 40% after I started using this platform! My clients love the ease of scheduling by cell phone.

testimonials.name: Carlos Mendes
testimonials.content: I reduced no-shows by more than 60% with automatic reminders. I save hours per week that I used to spend answering calls.

testimonials.name: Ana Costa
testimonials.content: Team management became much simpler. I can see the schedule of all veterinarians in real-time and optimize appointments.

testimonials.name: Roberto Santos
testimonials.content: Intuitive and complete platform. The reports help me make more strategic business decisions. I recommend it!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about the platform

questions.question: Can I cancel at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without penalties or additional fees. Your access will continue until the end of the paid period.

questions.question: Is there a setup or implementation fee?
questions.answer: There is no setup fee. You only pay the chosen monthly plan and can start using immediately after registration.

questions.question: Can I customize with my business's brand?
questions.answer: Yes! You can add your logo, choose your brand colors and completely customize the scheduling page to match your business's visual identity.

questions.question: How does customer support work?
questions.answer: All plans include email support. Pro and Advanced plans have access to priority support with faster response times. The Advanced plan includes dedicated support.

questions.question: Do I need to install any software?
questions.answer: No! The platform is 100% online and works in any browser. Just log in and start using. We also have mobile apps to facilitate access.

questions.question: Are my data safe?
questions.answer: Yes! We use end-to-end encryption and follow the best security practices. Your data and your clients' data are completely protected according to LGPD.
